subject: Simson Plus X gas pedal sound issue
description_text:
Good day,

Can you help me with this liquidy sound in my gas pedal when pressing it.
It is working but the sound is confusing me like there’s a liquid inside of
it. It is a month old. Please see the video attached.

It was purchased through aliexpress. Checked the photo


Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Willbert Oanes,  The liquid sound you hear is completely normal, as this is our upgraded pure hydraulic damper, not a cheap compressed gas spring. The sound is perfectly fine and nothing to worry about.

Hello,

Thank you for the quick response! I also asked some of the people in sim
racing groups and they also said it was normal. Thank you again.

Sincerely,

Willbert

On Mon, Aug 18, 2025 at 10:11 AM service@simsonn.com
